sentences.english: In this paper, the definition of reductio ad absurdum, logical principles and problem-solving steps.
sentences.chinese: 本文簡述了反證法的定義，邏輯原理和解題步驟。

sentences.english: Mathematics can be said to be required to build on the achievements is indelible.
sentences.chinese: 可以說反證法爲數學所建立的功勳是不可磨滅的。

sentences.english: He would not believe even with the disproof before his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 即使反證擺在眼前，他仍不相信。

sentences.english: Then treat with the prescription of "regulating and nourishing the lung and kidney" to prove the reliability of the model.
sentences.chinese: 用調補肺腎方進行治療有效，反證模型的可靠性。

sentences.english: He could not believe even with the disproof before his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 反證擺在眼前，他仍不能相信。

sentences.chinese: 用調補肺腎方進行治療有效，反證模型的可靠性。

sentences.english: Well in this specific case I am going to disprove your assumption.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣特殊的情況下，我打算對你的假設提出反證。
